name: server
description: Deco MCP server with an Astro documentation site, tools and workflows

scripts.dev: if not exist view-build mkdir view-build && wrangler dev
scripts.dev:worker: if not exist view-build mkdir view-build && wrangler dev
scripts.dev:deco: if not exist view-build mkdir view-build && deco dev
scripts.dev:remote: if not exist view-build mkdir view-build && wrangler dev --remote
scripts.deploy: npm run build:assets && wrangler build && deco deploy --yes ./dist
scripts.deploy:checked: npm run predeploy:cf && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy:domain: npm run build:assets && wrangler build && deco deploy --yes ./dist --domain $DOMAIN
scripts.deploy:app: npm run build:assets && wrangler build && deco deploy --yes ./dist --app $APP_NAME
scripts.deploy:app:win: npm run build:assets && wrangler build && deco deploy --yes ./dist --app %APP_NAME%
scripts.deploy:cf:fast: npm run gen && npm run build:assets && node scripts/wrangler-deploy-auto.mjs
scripts.deploy:cf:verbose: npm run gen && npm run build:assets && node scripts/wrangler-deploy-auto.mjs --verbose
scripts.deploy:cf: npm run predeploy && npm run test && npm run deploy:cf:fast
scripts.deploy:full:fast: npm run gen && npm run build:assets && node scripts/wrangler-deploy-auto.mjs && deco deploy --yes ./dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run predeploy && npm run test && npm run deploy:full:fast
scripts.deploy:deco: npm run gen && npm run build:assets && node scripts/with-hosting-config.mjs deco deploy --yes ./dist
scripts.deploy:full:checked: npm run predeploy:verify && npm run deploy:full
